channel.title: lan on blog
channel.description: Recent content in lan on blog

item.title: ROS connection between multiple machines on LAN
item.description: I have an orangepi zero that I want to connect to a ROS instance running on my desktop to play around with manual control on PX4. I have followed some instructions here but they appear not to work for me. The orangepi always says that there is no roscore running. I searched and searched and I came across this page that seems to provide correct instructions. I did it like in the below-mentioned procedure and the orange pi seems to recognize the ROS instance running on my desktop.
